definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

Ali (proper name)/Imam Ali ibn Abu Talib (c. 600-661), cousin, aid and son-in-law of the Prophet Mohammed 穆罕默德, the fourth Caliph 哈里發|哈里发 of Islam, reigned 656-661, and the first Imam 伊瑪目|伊玛目 of Shia Islam/Ngari prefecture in Tibet, Tibetan: Mnga' ris
li (Chinese unit of length equal to 500 meters)
Lyon, French city on the Rhône
Ali Baba, character from The Arabian Nights
Ali Baba, character from The Arabian Nights

sentences.english: S. senator. In Congress, Johnson was a strong advocate of America's westward expansion.
sentences.chinese: 在國會里，強森大力支持美國向西部擴張的計畫。

sentences.english: Folded in the card was a piece of paper.
sentences.chinese: 只見生日卡里夾着一張摺疊起來的紙。

sentences.english: We found people wandering like ghosts through the ruins .
sentences.chinese: 孤魂野鬼一樣的人們在廢墟里遊蕩。

sentences.english: State media reported that Shahram Amiri was asking for a quick return to Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗國家媒體報導說，阿米里要求迅速返回德黑蘭。

sentences.english: W:You want some cream in the coffee?
sentences.chinese: 你要在咖啡里加點奶油嗎？

sentences.english: I hear the elder sisters read aloud in the ruins
sentences.chinese: 我聽見廢墟里姐姐的書聲朗朗。

sentences.english: The farmers had to fetch water from a river which was a mile away from the village.
sentences.chinese: 家民們得從離村子一里路遠的河裏取來水。

sentences.english: The chair-cushion in the corner burst with laughter when she saw it.
sentences.chinese: 牆角里的那個舊椅套子也裂開來看它跳舞。

sentences.english: "These are the youth of our nation, " Thakare said.
sentences.chinese: “這些都是我們國家的年輕人，”塔卡里說。

sentences.english: In Chinese society very few fairy godmothers can be discovered.
sentences.chinese: 在中國社會里，很少有錢的女人慷慨捐助。

sentences.english: Rita repeated what Reardon recited when Reardon read the remarks.
sentences.chinese: 當里爾登讀評論時，麗塔重複里爾登背誦的東西。
這是派斯里的第一次訪問。

sentences.english: Do you remember visiting Casa de la Caritat?
sentences.chinese: 你還記得我們去參觀拉卡里塔特公寓嗎？

sentences.english: Melt chocolate with water in a small pot over a low flame.
sentences.chinese: 在一個小鍋里加水和巧克力，開小火加熱融化它。

sentences.english: They have developed the ability to move rather than just drift, jetting at up to four knots through the water.
sentences.chinese: 它們不止漂浮，還能遊動，在水中噴射至四海里。

definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to hit the target/to hit the nail on the head
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
Zhongdu, capital of China during the Jin Dynasty (1115-1234), modern day Beijing
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
there/that place/also written 那裡|那里
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
to watch from a height or distance/to survey
